sys_ui_page.html:
Fibonacci Scripted API

The Fibonacci Scripted API provides methods for interacting with Fibonacci Series including:
  • GET Fibonacci Series: This API will help you fetch the first N fibonacci number series. API end points: https://dev83909.service-now.com/api/x_74820_fibonacci/fibonacci_series/{number}. Necessary instrutions to access the API: 1. Open postman app. 2. Use GET method and paste the API end point there. 3. Pass a positive integer in path parameter. Error Handeling: 1. If the requested parameter is not a number, decimal, negative integer or 0 then a custom error message will be displayed. 2. If path parmater is not passed then an OOB error message will be displayed. Some Positive test exmaples: 1. API: https://dev83909.service-now.com/api/x_74820_fibonacci/fibonacci_series/1 Response: { "result": { "input": "1", "output": "[0]" } } 2. API: https://dev83909.service-now.com/api/x_74820_fibonacci/fibonacci_series/5 Response: { "result": { "input": "5", "output": "[0,1,1,2,3]" } } 3. API: https://dev83909.service-now.com/api/x_74820_fibonacci/fibonacci_series/8 Response: { "result": { "input": "8", "output": "[0,1,1,2,3,5,8,13]" } }
sys_ui_page.name: fibonacci_api_documentation
